column2: Up train approaching E758 signal on RedbridgeGoods from Maritime West Junction
Planning Notes

A train in excess of 94 SLU stood at E755 signal on the Maritime Back Road will foul the Up Docks Branch atMillbrook. Therefore, junction margins at Millbrook should be based on the departure time from Maritime EastJunction if this is the case.

A train in excess of 68 SLU stood at E757 signal on the Redbridge Goods will foul the Down Fast at Church LaneJunction (545A points). Therefore, junction margins at Church Lane Junction should be based on the departuretime from Maritime East Junction if this is the case.
